HOME OF DIGITAL IDENTITY

# BUILDING TRUSTED DIGITAL IDENTITY

We are Blockchain HELIX, a German Blockchain technology startup. Innovation,
creativity & sustainability is at the heart of everything we do. We offer a
Digital Identity solution for individuals and corporates, called helix id.
Join our mission in creating a trusted & secure Digital Identity ecosystem!

## In The news

#### as seen in

SET UP FOR SUCCESS

#### Our Story

It’s a magical moment where passion and business come together. Everything
happens suddenly: fulfillment, implementation, realization. The right people
with the right mindsets come together at exactly the right time. Everything
integrates together for the one vision. This is how power teams are created
and there is only one way forward. **Ladies and Gentlemen, Set Up For
Success!**

## Star of the show

## helix _id_

Join us as a Trusted Partner and benefit from leading-edge technology, easy
integration and greater visibility in our Digital Identity platform. Improve
your data quality while reducing your operational costs. Profit from
regulatory compliant KYC and AML services, while customers retain full control
of their private data. Secure your competitive advantage through
groundbreaking technology and the spirit of the next era. All this is made
possible by pioneering minds and the use of Blockchain technology.

Medium __ Facebook __

Go to Website

__Download all partnership models

Listen to the audience

#### ENCORE

"Trust is the basis of decentralized business relationships. The Digital
Identities and KYC verifications offered with helix id complement the company
verifications in the evan.network, so that trusting business relationships
between trusted partners can be digitized end-to-end without creating
dependencies to platform operators."

Thomas Müller CEO, evan network

"Authentication and Digital Identities are one of the most important topics in
the networked world. Secure and legally compliant KYC solutions are possible
here, particularly through the use of block chains. Our investment in helix id
underlines our philosophy of investing in technology that offers solutions for
the digital age. With helix id we have invested in a very experienced and
ambitious team that shares our strategy and vision."

Stefan SchützeMember of the management board, FinLab AG

"Blockchain-based identity management is the next big thing in digital
transformation where customers have a clear benefit: owning their data, having
full privacy and not having hundreds of passwords for hundreds of user
accounts."

Prof. Dr. Philipp SandnerFrankfurt School Blockchain Center

"Blockchain HELIX is introducing with helix id the Digital Identity to the
market. As FATF has recently recommended, such a product will provide a tool
to apply more efficient and low-risk Know-Your-Customer checks for Anti-Money-
Laundering purposes. It also gives the customer the power to protect his
privacy when dealing with corporates. A great achievement for the Blockchain
ecosystem by a German Blockchain veteran."

Alireza SiadatSimmons & Simmons

"Especially for banks helix id offers an interesting solution for the Digital
Identity on the Blockchain. helix id provides a platform on which personal
data can be shared by institutions, companies and banks in the B2B sector and
where the requirements of the DSGVO are met. The Know-Your-Customer (KYC)
process can thus be carried out quickly and securely."

Dr. Gerhard GrebeManaging Director, banXconsult GmbH

"There is a strong requirement for Digital Identity in the online and mobile
world. Digital processes need to be implemented from a customer’s perspective
without media disruption. The convenient and secure verification of identity,
combined with a TAN-free authentication and approval using digital signature
are the key success factors."

Jürgen WeissExecutive, Seal ONE

"Trust is the basis of decentralized business relationships. The Digital
Identities and KYC verifications offered with helix id complement the company
verifications in the evan.network, so that trusting business relationships
between trusted partners can be digitized end-to-end without creating
dependencies to platform operators."

Thomas Müller CEO, evan network

"Authentication and Digital Identities are one of the most important topics in
the networked world. Secure and legally compliant KYC solutions are possible
here, particularly through the use of block chains. Our investment in helix id
underlines our philosophy of investing in technology that offers solutions for
the digital age. With helix id we have invested in a very experienced and
ambitious team that shares our strategy and vision."

Stefan SchützeMember of the management board, FinLab AG

## Key Stories

###  Blockchain HELIX digitizes identities for Frankfurt – for every citizen
and every company

12/02/2021

The team from Frankfurt-based Blockchain  
HELIX AG, has been a technological pioneer in the field of digital identity
since  
2016, a topic which was recently declared a top priority by our Federal
Chancellor.

READ MORE

###  Blockchain HELIX joins Verband Sichere Digitale Identität

09/09/2020

The startup Blockchain HELIX located in Frankfurt am Main is now a member of
the Verband Sichere Digitale Identität e.V. (VSDI) from Berlin.
